title: 【电子数据取证】安卓镜像提取与解析
summary: The report describes a method for recovering data from smartphones, specifically mentioning Qualcomm HS-USB QDLoader 9008 and Mi5X. The method involves using the QPST Tool to download a brush pack and then use it to enter mode 9008 on the phone.

title: 人工智能可能修复帮助传播了 15 年的漏洞
title_translated: The repair of artificial intelligence may have helped spread a 15-year gap.
summary: A 10-year-old vulnerability in Node.js allows attackers to navigate outside of specified directories, and AI models may have reproduced this vulnerability due to training on public code repositories.

title: Citrix NetScaler ADC and Gateway Out-of-Bounds Read Vulnerability
title_translated: Citrix NetScaler ADC and Gateway Out-of-Bounds Read Vulnerability
summary: Citrix NetScaler ADC and Gateway contain an out-of-bounds read vulnerability due to insufficient input validation. This vulnerability can lead to memory overread when the NetScaler is configured as a Gateway (VPN virtual server, ICA Proxy, CVPN, RDP Proxy) OR AAA virtual server.
